title: Hour 2 - Phil Mickelson (05-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Phil Mickelson (05-27-20)
description:
Phil Mickelson talks about the golf event from this past weekend. He says Tom Brady had the best shot of the day. Phil tells Dan that he is open to being mic'd during regular golf open events. Phil says coming together for events like this was really cool.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
